lines.text: The dream to awaken our world...
You're out of control.
I take control! Whose side are you on?
I take no side...
You're skating the edge.
I am the edge!
What you *truly* want, only I can give.
You can't give it, can't even buy it, and you just don't *get* it.
That's the funny thing about memories, we are only what we remember of ourselves.
That which does not kill us, makes us stranger.

none that the mind is not guilty of imposing on them. I bid my people follow, and like all good equations, they follow; for full endowment of purpose, they do submit - in turn, they resign me to a role inhuman, impossible, and unaccountable. But I can no longer stand the sleepless nights... I think I am learning to love the Demiurge.
*You*! You drove it out! - All right, you got it, you got what you wanted. So you answer to no-one...
[Aeon points her gun at him]
Are you out of your mind?
The only reason I don't shoot you has nothing to do with duty or principle. It's simply a matter of knowing who I am.
Is *that* why you won't look at It
[the Demiurge]

, why you can't barely gaze? Because you've done terrible things. And then there are the transgressions you never even knew you'd committed. Those are the worst, because those you can never forget. All you can do is suspect...
I'm not in the habit of arguing about the color of red herrings!
Don't be selfish, Aeon. Think about *me* for a change.
We are not what we remember of ourselves. We can undo only what others have already forgotten. Learn from your mistakes, so that one day you can repeat them precisely.
[first lines]

The unobserved state is a fog of probabilities, a window of and for error. The watcher observes, the fog collapses, an event resolves. A theory becomes a fact... What is the truth? Tell me, if you know. And I will not believe you. Things are never what they seem. Clean gloves hide dirty hands - and mine are dirtier than most... Without truth, there can be no justice. Justice will be done!
Ask yourself, can you give yourself your own evil and your own good?
Don't make the mistake of fencing with me, I know who I am and what I am still capable of.
You're not a Breen.
You do not exist.
Blink once, you're dead. Blink twice, you're buried. Understand? Now unpack yourself.
Many people hate you and would like to see you dead. How does that make you feel?

[chuckles]
Those people should get to know me a little better. Then they'd know I don't indulge in feelings.
We won. We must have been right.

[on Bambara]
This is what happens when a good deal of intelligence is invested in ignorance, when the need for illusion is deep.
Piss off, ponce!
Now key her up and throw away the lock.
Smells trigger memories, Emon. I can smell Aeon now - leather... hazelnuts... gunpowder... sex.
Ready for the action now, danger boy?
Then leave, you are free to go. Your conscience will tell you what to do.
I have no conscience - you know what I mean.
That is not important, the important thing is that you know...
Man alive, Goodchild, you give me the hinks!
Fine to play with my feelings, but you are involving innocent people, Trevor! What are you doing to that poor girl!
Jealous?
One wish, and it's yours.
Anything?
Just no heads on plates. I'm going to get a drink, would you like one?
No, no thank you.
Right, that would have been it you know.
What are you doing here?
He stole a sample of me. I can't let him make a copy of me.
It's OK, I've taken care of it. The last thing I want is another one of you.
You're drooling on me!
I'm a genius; therefore I can afford to drool.

Inks! Minks! The old witch winks, that fat beings to fry! No body home but Jumping Joan, father, mother and I! Sticks! Stocks! Stone Dead! Blind men can't see! Every knave will have a slave, you or I must be he!
Do you have the Bliss pellets?
your favorite color! your lover!
What the flame does not consume, consumes the flame.
Cold meat, mutton pies. Tell me when your mother dies, I'll be there to bury her.
But now that I have you in my custody, I may do with you what I please.
Boo!
I thought you already had.
I have, I had, I will, I did - don't I? Isn't that right, hostess Judy?
You're nothing but a dirty carbuncle, festering in the corner!... No need to get uptight people, I was merely making an observation.
Tell the little witches to piss off!
Piss off, little witches.
You made me cut off my left arm and give it to a little boy! She tried to kill me!... Piss off!
Oh, the flesh will be tearing at the opera house tonight.
Nothing like a little judicious levity, I always say.
The will to evil is like an iron in a forge, there is only one way to shape it right - with a conscience which is the fire!
[after giving his arm to the little boy]
I'll never forget you,  I... I love you, you're what it's all about.
[Trevor has Aeon pinned to the ground]
You shot Rubio, and not me. Now, why is that?
Trevor, don't trouble me with your thin smile.
[she flips them so that she is on top]
Stop! There's a pain... in my back!
Can you describe it, in words?
What?
I want you to tell me about the pain.
Sharp... stabbing... piercing...
You're telling me nothing.
It feels... ugh!... .like a nail, twisting into my spine.
Yes. But there is no nail.
No.
So there is no pain.
[they kiss]
Please, tell me what you know!
We won. We must have been right.
You *know* something! Tell me what you know.
What I know? He said the light was beautiful. Yes, it was. No use, see, because the truth isn't even pretty. What else?... oh, right. Love isn't the answer, it's the problem.

A dream can seem to last for hours, and yet I awaken to find I have been sleeping only for a few minutes. The Habitat was my dream, and soon it will be gone. Bargeld could save it, but he is dying. I could save Aeon, but she will not come. Who will save me?
[Trevor is waiting for Aeon as the building they're in literally melts around them]
If she isn't here by now... They say cats always land on their feet, but at this point there's really no floor.
When will you give up, Aeon?
[he hands her a gun]
Here. Go ahead. Kill me, if that's what you want. You can't do it.
You think you know what I'm doing so obviously you don't. What I have in mind for you is much worse.

[to Trevor]
The only reason I don't shoot you isn't because of any duty or principle, it's simply a matter of knowing who I am.
Your mind has a gutter all its own.
I'm staggered by the complexity of these documents, sir. I've spent many hours trying to crack the code.
...What didn't you understand?
I think I have a handle on some of it. For example, the Mile-High Jellyfish, that's the upper house of Parliament. Am I right?
No...
And the Flying Saucer Men, that's the Ministry of Justice?
No, the flying saucer men are the flying saucer men! NARZAC. Area 66. The Global Empire!... What level ARE you?
[Gildemere is speechless]
We're men of peace, so we'll attack. Deploy the orbital jellyfish... next, the expulsion of all foreign particles...
[sits down to computer console]
You're mad... You're insane!
[Clavius punches him]
Shut up, Mother!
It's my fault. They came here to see me.
Your ego is staggering. What's this got to do with you?
These creatures have died from exposure to Aldus-B. Somehow, it shot from the satellite to their planet.
Nice going, Trevor. Making friends all over the universe.
performing recreational autopsies, defecating, and drinking rum. I've recently been given a conscience, and would very much like to help you.
Sybil, I already know about Aeon's C-Section.

[singing to herself]
Ready if I want it now, Danger Boy...
